title: Datapeek - Fact check online arguments with data
body:
Increase public interest for datasets by by linking them to relevant social media comments. We are bulding a platform where it will be easy to find data to illustrate arguments and reasonment on many topics

## Full Proposal
https://port.oceanprotocol.com/t/proposal-datapeek-fact-check-online-arguments-with-data/715/2

## Grant Deliverables
We have started to work:
-on the core ReQuest-Answer mechanic , gathering user feedback.
-on the automatic detection of arguments.
-on the automatic detection of data link on social media

We are going to work:
-on refining the previous points
-starting the work on automatic suggestion of datasets.


### Engage in community conversation, questions and feedback
https://discord.com/channels/612953348487905282/776848812534398986

## Cast your vote below!
author: 0x085EB211bB4890972C1279fbbac6003F79369d75
